item.title: The Spectral Theorem for Matrices
item.description: When working in data analysis it is almost impossible to avoid using linear algebra, even if it is on the background, e.g.Â simple linear regression. In this post I want to discuss one of the most important theorems of finite dimensional vector spaces: the spectral theorem. The objective is not to give a complete and rigorous treatment of the subject, but rather show the main ingredients, some examples and applications.
